page.title: 03 SHOPPING
page.content: In our survey of the Upper Richmond Road in Sheen, we found there were 210 businesses, including 10 antique shop and 22 eating places, including 3 Chinese, 3 Greek, 2 Italian, 2 French, 2 Indian and 1 English restaurants. There were also a fried chicken restaurant, a pizza place, 2 burger restaurants (one 'up-market'), 1 cafe, 1 fish and chip bar, 1 cafe providing meals and 2 patisseries-cum-tea-rooms. We found 2 supermarkets - Safeway and Waitrose - 3 butchers, 1 wet fishmonger, 1 gourmet grocers, 2 small 'open late' general grocers and 3 greengrocers. There were 9 ladies' fashion shops (3 up-market), 2 children's clothes shops, 4 shoe shops, 3 furniture shops and a few unusual ones - a gunsmiths, and an angling shop.
